00030 #pragma once
00031 
00032 #include "NvCloth/Allocator.h"
00033 
00034 namespace nv
00035 {
00036 namespace cloth
00037 {
00038 
00039 class Cloth;
00040 
00041 // called during inter-collision, user0 and user1 are the user data from each cloth
00042 typedef bool (*InterCollisionFilter)(void* user0, void* user1);
00043 
00045 class Solver : public UserAllocated
00046 {
00047   protected:
00048     Solver() {}
00049     Solver(const Solver&);
00050     Solver& operator = (const Solver&);
00051 
00052   public:
00053     virtual ~Solver() {}
00054 
00056     virtual void addCloth(Cloth*) = 0;
00057 
00059     virtual void removeCloth(Cloth*) = 0;
00060 
00061     // functions executing the simulation work.
00067     virtual bool beginSimulation(float dt) = 0;
00068 
00074     virtual void simulateChunk(int idx) = 0;
00075 
00079     virtual void endSimulation() = 0;
00080 
00083     virtual int getSimulationChunkCount() const = 0;
00084 
00085     // inter-collision parameters
00086     virtual void setInterCollisionDistance(float distance) = 0;
00087     virtual float getInterCollisionDistance() const = 0;
00088     virtual void setInterCollisionStiffness(float stiffness) = 0;
00089     virtual float getInterCollisionStiffness() const = 0;
00090     virtual void setInterCollisionNbIterations(uint32_t nbIterations) = 0;
00091     virtual uint32_t getInterCollisionNbIterations() const = 0;
00092     virtual void setInterCollisionFilter(InterCollisionFilter filter) = 0;
00093 
00095     virtual bool hasError() const = 0;
00096 };
00097 
00098 } // namespace cloth
00099 } // namespace nv
